resources.string:
"Uma ucindezela u-"Vumelanisa manje", i-Authenticator izozama ukuvumelanisa iwashi layo langaphakathi neziphakeli zakwa-Google ngesikhathi esisodwa. Izilungiselelo zosuku nesikhathi zedivayisi ngeke zishintshwe.

I-Authenticator ayihambisi noma iyiphi idatha yomuntu siqu noma ulwazi lwe-akhawunti ngenkathi ivumelanisa iwashi layo langaphakathi neziphakeli zakwa-Google.

Kungani lokhu kubalulekile

i-Authenticator yenza amakhodi okuqinisekiswa okuyizinyathelo ezimbili ngokususelwa 1) esikhathini samanje, futhi 2) inombolo eyimfihlo eyaziwa ohlelweni lokusebenza nakwisiphakeli.

Uma i-Authenticator nesiphakeli ziphikisana ekutheni ubani isikhathi, amakhodi enziwa uhlelo lokusebenza ngeke amukelwe uma uzama ukungena ngemvume.

Ngokuzenzakalelayo i-Authenticator isebenzisa izilungiselelo zosuku nesikhathi, futhi ezikhathini eziningi uzokwazi ukwenza amakhodi avumalekile ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi izilungiselelo zakho zesikhathi, usuku nezoni yesikhathi zulungiswe kahle. Yize kunjalo, uma ukungafani kwesikhathi kuvelo, kungabalukhuni ukuxazulula (ikakhulu uma usebenzisa isikhathi noma amazoni esikhathi anikelwa inethiwekhi)."
"Iwashi langaphakathi le-Authenticator lilungisiwe ukuze lifane nesikhathi esinikelwe iziphakeli zakwa-Google. "\n\n"Izilungiselelo zosuku nesikhathi kule divayisi azishintshiwe."
"Iwashi langaphakathi le-Authenticator lalingalungisiwe ngoba libonakala selivele livumelanisiwe neziphakeli zakwa-Google."
"Kube nenkinga ngokuxhumana nesiphakeli sakwa-Google. Sicela uhlole izilungiselelo zenethiwekhi yakho bese uyazama futhi."
